mapper.select: select saleNo, p.pNo, pName, pPrice, t.salePrice, to_char(saleStart, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') saleStart, to_char(saleEnd, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') saleEnd from timeSale t join product p on t.pNo=p.pNo order by saleNo desc
select pName, pPrice from product where pNo=#{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into timesale(saleNo, pNo, saleContent, saleStart, saleEnd, salePrice) values(timesalesq.nextval, #{pNo}, #{saleContent}, to_date(#{saleStart}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), to_date(#{saleEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), #{salePrice})
mapper.select: select saleNo, p.pNo, pName, pPrice, t.salePrice, to_char(saleStart, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') saleStart, to_char(saleEnd, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') saleEnd, saleContent from timesale t join product p on t.pNo=p.pNo and saleNo=#{param1}
mapper.update: update timesale set pNo=#{pNo}, salePrice=#{salePrice}, saleStart=to_date(#{saleStart}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), saleEnd=to_date(#{saleEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), saleContent=#{saleContent} where saleNo=#{saleNo}
